description: Commands to create hpc cache nfs storage target.

commands.name: az hpc-cache nfs-storage-target add
commands.summary: Create or update a nfs Storage Target. This operation is allowed at any time, but if the Cache is down or unhealthy, the actual creation/modification of the Storage Target may be delayed until the Cache is healthy again.
examples: az hpc-cache nfs-storage-target add --resource-group "scgroup" --cache-name "sc1" --name "st1" --nfs3-target 10.7.0.24 --nfs3-usage-model WRITE_AROUND --junction namespace-path="/nt2" nfs-export="/export/a" target-path="/1" --junction namespace-path="/nt3" nfs-export="/export/b"

commands.name: az hpc-cache nfs-storage-target update
commands.summary: Create or update a nfs Storage Target. This operation is allowed at any time, but if the Cache is down or unhealthy, the actual creation/modification of the Storage Target may be delayed until the Cache is healthy again.
